meanings.definition: relating to the incus bone in the middle ear
meanings.sent1: The incudal bone helps in transmitting sound vibrations.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the incudal structure to understand hearing mechanisms.
meanings.sent3: The tiny incudal bone threw a party for the other ear bones.
meanings.sent4: Her incudal knowledge of the ear's anatomy was as solid as the bone itself.
meanings.sent5: The incudal characteristics of the bone make it unique in the ear system.

meanings.definition: situated or occurring in the region of the incus
meanings.sent1: The incudal area is crucial for hearing functions.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are exploring the incudal space for new findings.
meanings.sent3: The incudal spot in the ear is like a cozy nook for sound.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed in the incudal chamber of her ear.
meanings.sent5: The incudal location is where sound waves meet their match.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the anvil-shaped bone in the middle ear
meanings.sent1: The incudal shape of the bone is essential for auditory processes.
meanings.sent2: The incudal structure plays a key role in hearing.
meanings.sent3: The anvil-like incudal bone had a hammering good time.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the incudal bone was as solid as its shape.
meanings.sent5: The incudal appearance of the bone makes it easily recognizable.
